customer_reviews.title: Just perfect.

I use this to split the signal of my PlayStation 4 to a Elgato capture card and my main monitor. I have noticed no input lag or anything of the sort, so do not worry about getting any lagging images/audio. The images show two boxes coming in one package, though in reality, it only comes with one.

customer_reviews.title: Works reasonably well - but didn't last 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to split my cable box output to a TV and SlingBox. Worked great for nearly 2 years, then I started getting periodic signal loss at either/both output connector. Disconnecting the power adapter or video cables and reconnecting them usually fixed the issue. Eventually the output signals were lost and couldn't be restored. I swapped out power adapters with no luck. So for < $15 it did its job for 2 years. So not a bad value. I am replacing it though with a much higher quality device that includes its own AC power adapter, rather than depending on a USB power source.

customer_reviews.title: NewBEP HDMI Splitter suddenly stopped working and is rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a very simple 1080p blu ray connection to two televisions. Usage was about two hours a day, three to four times a week. So let's say 8 hours a week for 20 weeks. So maybe 160 hours total usage since I bought the NewBEP HDMI Splitter before it stopped working. TV's are fine, can show 1080p on the existing HDMI input or any other input. Cables are fine, tried swapping them anyway. Blu ray player is fine, tried swapping that too. Tried a different splitter and things start working again. Conclusion: the NewBEP HDMI Splitter is not working. Don't waste your money or time on this splitter.
